resources.string:
- Both players gain 1CP 
 - Resolve additional rules 
 - Use stratagems

Are any units below half strength? 
 (Unit with starting strength of 1 has wounds less than half or number of models less than half starting strength) 
 No - proceed to MOVEMENT 
 Yes - continue to test

Roll 2D6 
 - 
 If result is greater than or equal to the highest Leadership (LD) in unit - PASS 
 - 
 On failure, the unit is BATTLE SHOCKED

While Battle Shocked: 
 - 
 Objective Control of all models is 0 
 - 
 Falling back requires a Desperate Escape test for each model 
 - 
 Unaffected by player's stratagems

- Move units - if within Engagement Range (ER) you must fall back or not move 
 - Models can move over friendly units unless the are Monsters or Vehicles 
 Normal Move = Up to M", not into ER 
 Advance Move = Up to M+D6", not into ER, cannot shoot or charge
- Models can move up to M" and cannot shoot or charge \n - Must make Desperate Escape to move over enemies (unless TITANIC or FLY) \n
Terrain \n Can move freely over features 2" or less, otherwise have to climb
Flying \n Can move over enemy models Measure path through air
Select all targets unit will shoot at \n All targets ust be visible to the shooter and within RANGE Can split targets between multiple weapons

Hit Roll: Roll D6 for each chance to hit (A) 
 - 
 Attack succeeds if: 
 Ranged higher than (BS) Ballistic Skill 
 Melee higher than (WS) Weapon Skill 
 - 
 Natural 6 always succeeds, Natural 1 always fails 
 - 
 Hit roll can never be modified more than -1 or +1
Wound Roll: Compare attacker\'s Strength (S) vs target\'s Toughness (T)
Strength is double toughness, you need 2+
Strength is greater than toughness, you need 3+
Strength is equal to toughness, you need 4+
Strength is less than toughness, you need 5+
Strength is half toughness, you need 6+
Natural 6 always succeeds, Natural 1 always fails \n Hit roll can never be modified more than -1 or +1

Allocate Attack: Target player allocates wounds 
 - 
 Models that have lost wounds take priority 
 - 
 Model doesn't have to be visible or within range

Saving Throw: Roll D6 and modify by Armor Penetration (AP) 
 - 
 Natural 1 always fails, roll can never be modified more than -1 or +1 
 - 
 If result is higher than Save (SV), attack fails, sequence ends 
 -
 If result is lower, model takes damage

Inflict Damage: Use Damage (D) from attack 
 - 
 Lose one wound for each point of damage
Unit can charge if: \n • It is within 12" of an enemy • Did not Advance or Fall Back • Not within Engagement Range (ER) • Not an AIRCRAFT • Target doesn\'t need to be visible

Roll 2D6 = max inches each model can move 
 - 
 • Charge roll must result in unit being:
 • Within ER of every unit initially selected 
 • Not within ER of an enemy not reselected 
 • In Unit Coherency 
 - 
 Or charge fails and unit doesn't move

Both players alternate fighting with units 
 - 
 Unit must be within Engagement Range and/or have Charged
Fights First - All units with ability

1) Pile In 
 Each model not already base-to-base can move up to 3" 
 -
 Must adhere to Unit Coherency, ER and end up closer to enemy unit

2) Melee Attacks 
 Must be in ER or base-to-base contact with another model in the unit that is base-to-base with an enemy 
 -
 Declare which weapon to use, note number of Attacks (A) 
 -
 Select targets, attacks can be split

3) Consolidate 
 Move up to 3" 
 - 
 Must end up closer, in base-to-base contact, in Coherency and ER of enemy 
 - 
 Alternately, unit can consolidate towards objective marker, if it will end up in range
